product_name: La Roche-PosayRedermic R Anti-Aging Retinol Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Redermic R Eyes Retinol Eye Cream with caffeine visibly reduces the appearance of crow's feet, wrinkles, dark circles and signs of fatigue.
details: DetailsBenefitsRetinol eye cream visibly reduces the look of crow's feet, wrinkles and dark circlesRefreshing gel texture provides an instant visible lifting effectAnti aging eye cream formula promotes a more rested appearance with caffeineSoothes the skin and provides antioxidant benefits with mineral-rich La-Roche Posay Thermal Spring WaterSuitable for sensitive skin, sensitive eyes and contact lens wearersNon-comedogenicDermatologist, ophthalmologist and allergy testedKey IngredientsPure retinol helps promote the skin's natural exfoliation process and resurface the skinCaffeine is a potent antioxidant that helps promote a brighter, more-rested look while soothing the skinLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensItem 2574394How To UseRecommended for use at night. If applied in the morning, apply a sunscreen after. If used in conjunction with a facial moisturizer, use the eye product first. If skin is sensitive during first usage, space out applications.IngredientsAqua / Water, Isocetyl Stearate, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Propylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caffein, Isohexadecane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Retinol, Retinyl Linoleate, Adenosine, Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysilicone-8, Polysorbate 80, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Recommended for use at night. If applied in the morning, apply a sunscreen after. If used in conjunction with a facial moisturizer, use the eye product first. If skin is sensitive during first usage, space out applications.

reviews.headline: Dermatologist recommended to me.
reviews.comments: Love this and works as well, if not better than its more expensive competitors. Save some coin and give this a try. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.headline: Stay consistent!!
reviews.comments:
I am very prone to irritation & retinols. I'm able to use this every night with no issues at all. I have hereditary dark circles from my middle eastern background & was starting to notice more wrinkle under my eyes. I was not expecting this to work that well I'll be honest! For my dark circles & fine lines this product has to be the best I've used!! For the first month or 2 I  was using it on & off because I was scared to use it every night. Then consistently started to use it & noticed pretty dramatic results. My under eyes have never looked so bright & my fine lines are very faint now. 

Stay consistent!! This product is gold✨✨

reviews.headline: Irritated my undereye
reviews.comments: I would not buy this product again. With only two uses, my under eyes dried and cracked.

reviews.headline: Was very disappointed
reviews.comments: I had gotten it as a present last Christmas ( it was something I researched and wanted to try) I used it every day never got any irritation or seen any thing happen at all as far as helping with fine lines. I'm the type of person when I'm trying anything I'm very consistent and follow the instructions as told so it's wasn't like I used it here and there and didn't follow what it has said. IV tried many products since I just turned 40 and what to find a good product not to stop aging or be a miracle lol but something that helps with female skin once you hit your 40s ya know?! This is definitely not a product I will use again and did nothing for me! I get everyone is different but come on something that is one of the "higher" amounts of retinol in it and it to do nothing? I don't buy it or it's not very good retinol in this product. That's how I look at it but that's what happened when I used this product!

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: Happy with this product

reviews.headline: Gave me a chemical burn
reviews.comments: Highly do not recommend this  product it gave me a severe chemical burn and ive had swollen under eys for 3 days now.

reviews.headline: Left my skin with rashes
reviews.comments: I purchased this when a dermatologist recommended this, it's even mentioned by youtube dermatologists who claim its a savior, sadly I experienced the opposite!  I have sensitive skin and this BURNED like crazy only after a second use,  me thinking it was normal, used it 1 more time just to see if it was me over reacting... NOPE!  I HAVE BURNS ANDSCABS UNDER MY EYES AND MY CHEEK HAD 3 SMALL HOLES THAT BURNED! do not recommend and do not attempt if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: super good
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream. I use it every 3 days with the serum and I love how it makes my skin feel and look. non-irritating

reviews.headline: Some reaction and stinging
reviews.comments: I attempted to use this in conjunction with tret. which my dermatologist at this point said i would be pointless and they do the same thing. Not to mention the stinging and sometime red reaction I would get around my eyes. Love this entire brand, but I will have to say no to this product personally.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I have tried lots of eye creams over the years and, though many have been great for moisturizing and reducing puffiness, this is the first one that actually lightens under eye circles too. (Many claim to, but this one works!)This product is amazing! It leaves my skin feeling smooth, reduces the appearance of fine lines, AND lightens the shadows under my eyes. I'm so glad my dermatologist recommended this product!

reviews.headline: No peeling or stinging
reviews.comments: I really like this eye cream. It's moisturizing and hydrating and doesn't feel sticky or tight at all. The 0.1% retinol strength is higher than I've seen in other retinol eye creams, but so far I haven't experienced any irritation, probably thanks to most (all?) of the retinol being encapsulated. I've been using this a couple of weeks now as a preventive measure for anti-aging, so it's not possible for me to say yet whether it really works for slowing down the development of wrinkles, but I figure that with the reasonably high amount of retinol in the formula, this is probably one of the most promising products out there. Since it hasn't caused irritation, I will continue to use it comfortably.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I haven't seen any improvement with my dark circles or wrinkles, and it's been months. This is hydrating, but it's not worth the money just for that.

reviews.headline: Good for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have only peeled once since using this and it was from squeezing too much out and over application. Otherwise if has worked great and I could tell a difference after a few weeks. The packaging could be improved

reviews.headline: If you're prone to milia this will help!
reviews.comments: I've gotten really into skin care over the last year and part of my routine now includes an eye moisturizer. However, I noticed two spots where milia popped up. I read that Retinol was good for removing and preventing these spots so I purchased this. After 2 weeks of use my 2 areas of milia are completely gone. My under eye looks refreshed and while I don't have bags or wrinkles, my under eye looks so much smoother. Happy with the results as long as it keeps the milia away!

reviews.headline: Lovely light cream
reviews.comments: I found the anti aging cream to be effective on my wrinkles.  It was too strong for me to use every day.  I was able to use it maybe three mornings a week without redness.  The cream absorbs quickly and feels wonderful.  My moisturizer contains sunscreen, so sun exposure/retinol combo was less of a concern for me.  I will reorder this product when the tube is gone.  The author of this review received a free sample of this product.

reviews.headline: My favorite product!
reviews.comments: I love this product for reducing dark circles under the eyes. I use this daily and love how lightweight it is!

reviews.headline: I really love this product.
reviews.comments: I have dark circles, crows feet, and tired, puffy eyes. I found this product very helpful in making my eyes look and feel better. My skin is a bit sun-sensitive when using retinol, so I need to be sure to wear sunscreen when I go outside.

reviews.headline: The Best Thus Far
reviews.comments: This is a really gentle yet effective product. I did use in conjunction with another product (one for day and the other for night) but they worked really well at tag teaming my problem areas. I'm still waiting to see improvement in the dark circle area but all of the other issues seem to be at bay so i'm willing to wait and continue applying for more results. I would recommend the product for sure especially for those who have problem areas around the eyes; my suggestion is to give it some time to show and prove.

reviews.headline: Soothing Experience
reviews.comments: I found this product to be very soothing to the eye area.  I liked the lightweight feel of it and the ease of applying.  I also like that it is fragrance free and won't interfere with any perfume I choose to wear.  The product reduced the puffiness under my eyes and lightened the darkness.  It also seemed to tighten the loose skin somewhat and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.  All in all, I like this product and will probably continue to use it. The author of this review received a free sample of this product.

reviews.headline: Results!
reviews.comments: I definitely have dark circles and fine lines so am always looking for a product to help in this area. I have seen a difference in my dark circles after using but I still need to wear under eye concealer. The product goes on smoothly and isn't heavy feeling. My fine lines have also improved! Gravity is a constant but it's great finding a product to help! "The author of this review received a free sample of this product"

media.headline: Easy to use and quick results
media.caption: After 2 applications

media.headline: Must have under eye cream!
media.caption: Look at those bright under eyes!

media.headline: Hydration with Benefits
media.caption: A little goes a long way

faceoff_positive.comments: I loooove how this cream feels--silky smooth and lightweight.  Also it instantly perks up my tired eyes making them feel wide awake (I believe, because of the caffeine ingredient?). At 40 years old I have spent over a decade trying dozens of various eye creams to find one that tightens the eye area, treats wrinkles, and cools/gives eyes an instant lift and wide awake feel. This is hands down the "only" all around winner. And I have tried so many; most costing in the $90 to $150 range. I love this cream so much I find myself re-applying multiplying it times a day. I've become addicted to the cooling/wake awake feel it gives my eyes, along with a tightening/smoothing effect (my concealer goes on beautifully after I've applied this cream and let it dry for about 1 minute). Another perk for me: the price. So unless this formula discontinues or changes, I will remain a devoted fan.  I've purchased myself backups already (6 to be exact!).
faceoff_positive.headline: Works!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I want to say this product is amazing but to be honest, I haven't had enough time using it to see much of a change. I do have dark under eyes and from my before and after pictures I took I can see some what of a difference. Nothing major. So maybe if used long enough results will show even more.
faceoff_negative.headline: Caught in between

rollup.name: Redermic R Anti-Aging Retinol Eye Cream
